column5: One more day of work and then i'll be heading off to the bay of quinte for the opener and turney,,,just wonder who all will be up there??  i'll be staying up with easton at his trailer in pickeral park...wave me down and say hi if ya see me,,i'll be in the legend boat with the lights!!lol,,, Also cant wait to try my new trolling setup,,,a shimano cardiff 400a and quantum mh rod,,,sweet setup!!
Have fun Sonny !!! Sure hope the weatherman is wrong....
Should be an awesome weekend. I will be there as well. Good luck

Hey irish,,,,nothin but waves will keep me off the lake,,,i know it's gonna rain but i won't melt!!!   and the way i look at it is the fish will be less spooky and maybe keep some others off the lake!!
Sonny, you guys gonna be around on the May long weekend ??  We fish down by the ferry after dark, but will be in Hay Bay during the day on Saturday & Sunday, so have a look for a green Crestliner

Hey lew i'd love to meet up with ya that weekend but not sure if that is possible,,,with two small ones at home time is limited for me,,but if i'm up that way i'll be sure to look ya up,,,this weekend is an anual trip for me so planned way far in advance!
I am heading to the BOQ Friday afternoon staying at Bayside cottages its your turn to drive over my way Sonny see ya there.  MTP
ill be up on quinte on the weekend also.. Going to be a wet, windy busy weekend on the water !! hopefully lots of fish !
Good luck Sonny, catch the winner buddy. You can do it  . Wish I could get down their also. I'm planning a trip for somewhere else, for a week.
